column4: does anyone have any idea why /etc/default/console-setup wont hold its settings after ubuntu finishes booting? when the kernel spewed its usual memory crap at the beginning it changed to what i set it to but then the consoles reverted back to the ubuntu default. any idea what would cause this?
did you check if 'sudo dpkg-reconfigure console-setup' has the same behavior?
thanks man i think that got it
